itunes:title: S4, E2: Technology
title: S4, E2: Technology
itunes:author: That Sounds Fun Network
itunes:subtitle: Help and Hope for Managing Screen Time
itunes:summary:
Join Sissy Goff and David Thomas this week as they revisit the ever-present topic of technology with help and hope for managing screentime and devices in your family.

Grab links, stats, and quotes you want to remember in the show notes at https://www.gominno.com/parents/raising-boy-girls-podcast-s4-e2-technology/

Connect with Sissy, David, and Melissa at raisingboysandgirls.com

Connect with Minno at podcast.gominno.com
